meanings.definition: A school or institute for the intensive study of Hebrew.
meanings.sent1: At the ulpan, students learn Hebrew intensively.
meanings.sent2: I enrolled in an ulpan to improve my Hebrew skills.
meanings.sent3: The ulpan was so busy that even the pencils were studying Hebrew!
meanings.sent4: Her mind became an ulpan, absorbing Hebrew like a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The ulpan buzzed with the sounds of eager learners mastering Hebrew.

meanings.definition: A course or program for learning Hebrew, typically in Israel.
meanings.sent1: The ulpan in Israel was a great way to immerse in Hebrew.
meanings.sent2: Joining an ulpan helped me communicate better in Hebrew.
meanings.sent3: The ulpan trip to Israel was both educational and fun.
meanings.sent4: In the ulpan, Hebrew became a bridge to a new culture.
meanings.sent5: The ulpan experience in Israel left a lasting impact on my language skills.
